title: Create a Virtual Kit (Bill of Materials)
description: A marketing team wants to sell a new product bundle online. An inventory analyst must create a virtual kit in the system so that when the kit is sold, the system allocates the component inventory.

tasks.description: Create a new SKU for the product bundle (the 'parent' item).
tasks.expected_outcome: A new product SKU is created.

tasks.description: Define a Bill of Materials (BOM) for the new parent SKU, linking it to the component SKUs and their required quantities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully defines the relationship between the parent kit and its children components.

tasks.description: Activate the kit. Now, when an order for the parent SKU is placed, the system will automatically check and reserve inventory for the component SKUs.
tasks.expected_outcome: The virtual kit is now live and sellable.
